title: Diamond Radiance Short Haaram - Shimmering Elegance
features: This contemporary take on the traditional short haaram (కంఠాభరణం) features a dazzling array of brilliant cut diamonds set in a linear, geometric pattern. The design culminates in a central pendant, adorned with a vibrant ruby and framed by intricate diamond work. Delicate gold bead droplets add a touch of traditional South Indian charm. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting, lustrous shine.
description: This exquisite piece seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian sensibilities. The brilliant diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the emerald and ruby accents add a touch of regal elegance. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this necklace is a testament to exceptional quality and craftsmanship. A perfect investment piece that will be cherished for generations.
